name: petroleum coke to generic market for coke | coke | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4806/documentation

petroleum coke and coal coke can partly be traded on the same market,  because some uses requiring coke (ie. fuel purposes) do not require a specific type of coke. The purpose of this activity is to link certain amount of a specific petroleum coke to the coke market, in which both products are sustitutable by another.

This activity renames part of the petroleum coke to "coke" for sale on thie more generic coke market.
category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/191:Manufacture of coke oven products/1910:Manufacture of coke oven products
